documentation.text:
@title ERC721 with permit
 @notice Nonfungible tokens that support an approve via signature, i.e. permit
@dev Gets the current nonce for a token ID and then increments it, returning the original value
@dev The hash of the name used in the permit signature verification
@dev The hash of the version string used in the permit signature verification

@inheritdoc IERC721Permit
 @dev Value is equal to keccak256("Permit(address spender,uint256 tokenId,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)");

attributes.text:
@title ERC721 with permit
 @notice Nonfungible tokens that support an approve via signature, i.e. permit
@dev Gets the current nonce for a token ID and then increments it, returning the original value
@dev The hash of the name used in the permit signature verification
@dev The hash of the version string used in the permit signature verification

@inheritdoc IERC721Permit
 @dev Value is equal to keccak256("Permit(address spender,uint256 tokenId,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)");

returns._0: The domain seperator used in encoding of permit signature

params.deadline: The deadline timestamp by which the call must be mined for the approve to work
params.r: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `v` and `s`
params.s: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `v`
params.spender: The account that is being approved
params.tokenId: The ID of the token that is being approved for spending
params.v: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `s`

PERMIT_TYPEHASH.details: Value is equal to keccak256("Permit(address spender,uint256 tokenId,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)");

nameHash.details: The hash of the name used in the permit signature verification

versionHash.details: The hash of the version string used in the permit signature verification

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().notice: The domain separator used in the permit signature

PERMIT_TYPEHASH().notice: The permit typehash used in the permit signature

permit(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,byt.notice: Approve of a specific token ID for spending by spender via signature

userdoc.notice: Nonfungible tokens that support an approve via signature, i.e. permit
